bug.author: tyusr
bug.description:
Bugfix for nnictl experiment delete <experiment_id>: in nni/tools/nni_cmd/config_utils.py line 79:
nni/tools/nni_cmd/config_utils.py
Lines 77 to 81 in 30152b0
def remove_experiment(self, expId):
'''remove an experiment by id'''
if id in self.experiments:
self.experiments.pop(expId)
self.write_file()
id should be expId
